verses.verse: Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> [and] <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You are <S%H2204>old<s%> [and] <S%H935>advanced<s%> in <S%H3117>years,<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7604>remains<s%> to be <S%H3423>possessed.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H7604>remains:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1552>regions<s%> [of] the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [those of] the <S%H1651>Geshurites;<s%>

from the <S%H7883>Shihor<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>east<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> (it is <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>); the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> the <S%H5841>Gazite,<s%> the <S%H796>Ashdodite,<s%> the <S%H832>Ashkelonite,<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite,<s%> the <S%H6139>Ekronite;<s%> and the <S%H5761>Avvite<s%>

to the <S%H8486>south,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and <S%H4632>Mearah<s%> that belongs to the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H663>Aphek,<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite;<s%>

and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1382>Gebalite,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east,<s%> <S%H8121><s%> from Baal-gad <S%H8478>below<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Lebo-hamath.

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Misrephoth-maim, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> I will <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> <S%H5307>allot<s%> it to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H2505>apportion<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>"

With the other half-tribe, the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H4217>east,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to them;

from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> with the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4334>plain<s%> of <S%H4311>Medeba,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H1769>Dibon;<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and <S%H4602>Maacathites,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5548>Salecah;<s%>

<S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and in <S%H154>Edrei<s%> (he alone was <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>); for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> them and <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> them.

But the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did not <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> or the <S%H4602>Maacathites;<s%> for <S%H1650>Geshur<s%> and <S%H4601>Maacath<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H7534>Only<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he did not <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> are their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> [an inheritance] to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>territory<s%> was from <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H8193>edge<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> with the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4334>plain<s%> by <S%H4311>Medeba;<s%>
<S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are on the <S%H4334>plain:<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon<s%> and Bamoth-baal and Beth-baal-meon,
and <S%H3096>Jahaz<s%> and <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> and <S%H4158>Mephaath,<s%>
and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%> and <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%> and Zereth-shahar on the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%>
and Beth-peor and the <S%H794>slopes<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%> and Beth-jeshimoth,

even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> with the <S%H5387>chiefs<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H189>Evi<s%> and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%> and <S%H6698>Zur<s%> and <S%H2354>Hur<s%> and <S%H7254>Reba,<s%> the <S%H5257>princes<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> the <S%H7080>diviner,<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> [the rest of] their <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> was the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> was the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> also <S%H5414>gave<s%> [an inheritance] to the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>territory<s%> was <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H6177>Aroer<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7237>Rabbah;<s%>
and from <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as Ramath-mizpeh and <S%H993>Betonim,<s%> and from <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir;<s%>

and in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> Beth-haram and Beth-nimrah and <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> and <S%H6829>Zaphon,<s%> the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> with the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> as a <S%H1366>border,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the [lower] <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3220>Sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H4217>east.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> and their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> also <S%H5414>gave<s%> [an inheritance] to the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and it was for the half-tribe of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>territory<s%> was from <S%H4266>Mahanaim,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2333>towns<s%> of <S%H2971>Jair,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%>

also <S%H2677>half<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> with <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> [were] for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> for <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are [the territories] <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5157>apportioned<s%> for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> to the <S%H4217>east.<s%>

But to the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> did not <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as He had <S%H1696>promised<s%> to them.
